homeDesc: Accelerating the decentralized future, Fractal DAOs provide secure, immutable systems that foster inclusivity and efficiency in governance.
governDesc: Distributed decision-making, enables a more inclusive and equitable system
mintDesc: Grant holders the right to participate in the governance and decision-making
launchDesc: Deploy the smart contracts, distribute governance tokens, and launch
featuredDesc: Explore organizations that have DAOs built on the Fractal framework
decentDesc: We are an open-source collective that unites builders toward global decentralization.
awakeDesc: Awake Internet Protocols combine AI and FinTech to empower Decentralized Private Equity for the multiverse. Welcome to Awakened Value Co-creation aka AwakeVC.
